EmailTemplate.description: Reminder to case owners to update their Anticipated Export Dollar Value with the Actual Dollar Value
EmailTemplate.name: Case- Update with Actual Dollar Value
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Update Your Recently Closed Export Promotion Case with Actual Dollar Value
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Day,
You recently closed Export Promotion Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}.
This is a reminder to please update the Anticipated/Actual Export Dollar field (currently: {!Case.Expected_Value__c}) to be the Actual Export Dollar value.
You can click this link to access your case: https://trade--tpd.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!Case.Id}
Regards, ITA Automation
